title: Imagery Change Detection
description: An imagery analyst must compare a new satellite image with an older one of the same location to detect any changes, such as new military construction.

tasks.description: Retrieve the new and archival satellite images for the specified area of interest.
Run an automated change detection algorithm to highlight differences between the two images.
tasks.expected_outcome: The tool highlights several areas of significant change.

tasks.description: Manually inspect the highlighted changes and identify the construction of new missile silos.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly interprets the changes and identifies the new military threat.
